creditline: Gift of Mrs. John Crosby in memory of Mrs. Albert W. Hastings
description: cruet set with five bottles of cut crystal on a rimmed plate stand; the rim is pierced in slits and circles, and a handle with large beaded decoration projects from the center of the plate; the three feet are joined to the plate by a leaf design
medium: Sheffield plate (silver fused to copper), die-stamped silver (feet), glass
title: Cruet set
